meta.title: Expert IT Support & Solutions in the Netherlands | Techcura
meta.description: Techcura offers 24/7 expert IT support, cybersecurity, and infrastructure solutions for SMEs in the Netherlands. Simplify your IT and boost productivity.
meta.keywords: IT support Netherlands, SME IT services, cybersecurity solutions, managed IT services, IT infrastructure, tech support

hero.title: Your IT, Simplified. Secure. Productive.
hero.subtitle: Techcura offers 24/7 expert IT support and infrastructure solutions for SMEs in the Netherlands, ensuring smooth and secure operations.

services.title: Our Core Services
services.subtitle: A Tiered Approach to Fit Your Business Needs
services.tier1Item1: IT Support & Helpdesk Services (remote and onsite)
services.tier1Item2: Office & Facility IT Support (Wi-Fi, cabling, printers, etc.)
services.tier2Item3: Domain and access control (Active Directory setup and maintenance)
services.tier2Item4: Onsite infrastructure monitoring and escalation resolution
services.tier3Item1: Advanced Server & Application Support (performance tuning, patching)
services.tier3Item2: Cloud & Backup Solutions (Office 365, Google Workspace, AWS)
services.tier3Item3: Cybersecurity Services (endpoint protection, firewalls, threat detection, compliance)
services.tier3Item4: Hybrid and On-prem/cloud IT environment support
services.assetManagementDesc: Inventory tracking, lifecycle management, warranty tracking, and usage monitoring of your IT assets. Gain full visibility and control over your hardware and software.
services.procurementDesc: From laptops and routers to licensed software and cloud services, we help you choose the right technology, negotiate with vendors, and manage procurement logistics.

howItWorks.title: How Techcura Works For You
howItWorks.step1Desc: Reach out to us with your IT needs. We'll schedule a consultation to understand your business and challenges.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Our experts conduct a thorough analysis of your current IT infrastructure and identify key areas for improvement.
howItWorks.step3Desc: We design and implement customized solutions, from hardware setup to cybersecurity, tailored to your unique requirements.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Benefit from continuous monitoring and 24/7 expert support to ensure your IT environment runs smoothly and securely.

about.title: About Techcura
about.description: Techcura is a modern IT support and infrastructure solutions company based in the Netherlands, dedicated to helping SMEs run smoothly and securely. We offer 24/7 expert support across hardware, networking, application maintenance, cybersecurity, and server operations. Our end-to-end services are designed to eliminate IT headaches, improve performance, and ensure your business stays connected, protected, and productive.

inquiry.title: Have an Inquiry?
inquiry.description: Interested in our services or have a specific question? Fill out our inquiry form and our team will get back to you promptly.

contact.title: Get in Touch with Techcura
contact.description: Ready to eliminate your IT headaches? Contact us today to learn how Techcura can support your business.
